import { Container } from '../../style'; const CommunicatingUsingTagprosPlatform = () => { return (

If you need to communicate with your students or their parents, here are the options we provide:

  • Live video chatting during live classes
  • Private messaging using your teacher’s account
  • Announcements in the Class tab

We advise that all communications regarding the class be made in the options provided above to avoid any suspicious activities from other people. This will also allow us to investigate incidents more easily to be able to act accordingly.

 

Video Chatting During Live Classes

Most of your communication with your learners will be during your classes on Jitsi. It is important for you to encourage your students to ask relevant questions that come into mind so that any issue can be resolved as quickly as possible.

 

Private Messaging

You can message both the parents and students using the private messaging feature of your teacher’s account. You can choose to message the parents to check up on the status of the students, schedule any makeup sessions, answer questions that they ask, etc. You can also message the students themselves to get more direct communication with them to have a deeper understanding of their progress in the class.

Please note that private messages should only be about topics that are relevant to the class you are handling. Violation of this rule will be subject to penalties and will be evaluated by our support team.

 

Classroom Posts

You can also access the classroom to post any announcements from your class. All posts from the classroom can be seen by the parents and learners and the parents will also receive email notifications to ensure that everyone will be reached.

); }; export default CommunicatingUsingTagprosPlatform;
